remarks: The projective map of a Hilbert lattice maps to projective subspaces. Part of Theorem 15.5 of [MaedaMaeda] p. 62.  (Contributed by NM, 17-Oct-2011.)
statement:
pmapsub.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
pmapsub.s $e |- S = ( PSubSp ` K ) $.
pmapsub.m $e |- M = ( pmap ` K ) $.
pmapsub $p |- ( ( K e. Lat /\ X e. B ) -> ( M ` X ) e. S ) $.
